translations.zh-hant: @@untranslatable_placeholder_58cfcc64

segments.source_content: Today, we officially release **[Docusaurus 2 i18n](https://docusaurus.io/docs/i18n/introduction)** ([internationalization](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Internationalization_and_localization)), as part of [2.0.0-alpha.71](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/releases/tag/v2.0.0-alpha.71).

translations.zh-hant: 今天，我們正式發佈 **[Docusaurus 2 i18n](https://docusaurus.io/docs/i18n/introduction)** ([國際化](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Internationalization_and_localization)) 功能，作為 [2.0.0-alpha.71](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/releases/tag/v2.0.0-alpha.71) 版本的一部分。

segments.source_content: Docusaurus 2 has now reached **full feature parity with Docusaurus 1**. 🎉 And soon, after a few additional infrastructure updates and a bit more testing, the **first Docusaurus 2 beta** will be released.

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 2 現已實現 **與 Docusaurus 1 的完整功能對等**。🎉 在完成一些基礎架構更新和更多測試後，**首個 Docusaurus 2 beta 版**即將發佈。

segments.source_content: **We went the extra mile**, and the new i18n support is **even better than in Docusaurus 1**.

translations.zh-hant: **我們付出了額外努力**，新的 i18n 支援 **甚至比 Docusaurus 1 更加完善**。

segments.source_content: In this post, we will present you the **translation workflow**, explain some **design decisions** and **showcase early adopter sites** that just went live: [Jest](https://jestjs.io/), [Redwood](https://learn.redwoodjs.com/), and [Datagit](https://datagit.ir/).

translations.zh-hant: 本文將介紹 **翻譯工作流程**，解釋部分 **設計決策**，並 **展示已上線的早期採用者網站**：[Jest](https://jestjs.io/)、[Redwood](https://learn.redwoodjs.com/) 和 [Datagit](https://datagit.ir/)。

segments.source_content: We also **dogfood** the i18n support on the **Docusaurus 2 site itself**, and this post is already available in [English](https://docusaurus.io/blog/2021/03/09/releasing-docusaurus-i18n) and [French](https://docusaurus.io/fr/blog/2021/03/09/releasing-docusaurus-i18n)!

translations.zh-hant: 我們也在 **Docusaurus 2 官方網站**上 **實踐** i18n 支援，本文已提供 [英文](https://docusaurus.io/blog/2021/03/09/releasing-docusaurus-i18n) 和 [法文](https://docusaurus.io/fr/blog/2021/03/09/releasing-docusaurus-i18n) 版本！

segments.source_content: ## Translate your site

translations.zh-hant: ## 翻譯您的網站

segments.source_content: You can translate a Docusaurus site in **3 simple steps**:

translations.zh-hant: 只需 **3 個簡單步驟** 即可翻譯 Docusaurus 網站：

segments.source_content:
1. **Configure**: declare the default locale and alternative locales in `docusaurus.config.js`
1. **Translate**: put the translation files at the [correct filesystem location](https://docusaurus.io/docs/next/i18n/introduction#translation-files-location)
1. **Deploy**: build and deploy your site using a single or multi-domain strategy

translations.zh-hant:
1. **配置**：在 `docusaurus.config.js` 中聲明預設語言和替代語言
1. **翻譯**：將翻譯文件放置於 [正確的文件系統位置](https://docusaurus.io/docs/next/i18n/introduction#translation-files-location)
1. **部署**：使用單一或多域名策略構建並部署您的網站

segments.source_content: The i18n support is **very flexible** and based on the **filesystem**.

translations.zh-hant: i18n 支援 **極具彈性** 且基於 **文件系統**。

segments.source_content: The **[i18n tutorial](https://docusaurus.io/docs/i18n/tutorial)** is the best way to get started, and we provide help to use **[Git](https://docusaurus.io/docs/i18n/git)** or **[Crowdin](https://docusaurus.io/docs/i18n/crowdin)**.

translations.zh-hant: **[i18n 教程](https://docusaurus.io/docs/i18n/tutorial)** 是最佳入門方式，我們還提供使用 **[Git](https://docusaurus.io/docs/i18n/git)** 或 **[Crowdin](https://docusaurus.io/docs/i18n/crowdin)** 的協助。

segments.source_content: ## Design decisions

translations.zh-hant: ## 設計決策

segments.source_content: The goals of the Docusaurus i18n system are:

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus i18n 系統的目標是：

segments.source_content:
- **Simple**: just put the translated files in the [correct filesystem location](https://docusaurus.io/docs/next/i18n/introduction#translation-files-location)
- **Flexible translation workflows**: use Git (monorepo, forks, or submodules), SaaS software, FTP
- **Flexible deployment options**: single, multiple domains, or hybrid
- **Modular**: allow plugin authors to provide i18n support
- **Low-overhead runtime**: documentation is mostly static and does not require a heavy JS library or polyfills
- **Scalable build-times**: allow building and deploying localized sites independently
- **Localize assets**: an image of your site might contain text that should be translated
- **No coupling**: not forced to use any SaaS, yet integrations are possible
- **Easy to use with [Crowdin](https://crowdin.com/)**: multiple Docusaurus 1 sites use Crowdin, and should be able to migrate to v2
- **Good SEO defaults**: we set useful SEO headers like [`hreflang`](https://developers.google.com/search/docs/advanced/crawling/localized-versions) for you
- **RTL support**: locales reading right-to-left (Arabic, Hebrew, etc.) are supported and easy to implement
- **Default translations**: classic theme labels are translated for you in [many languages](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/tree/main/packages/docusaurus-theme-translations/locales)

translations.zh-hant:
- **簡單**：只需將翻譯文件放在 [正確的文件系統位置](https://docusaurus.io/docs/next/i18n/introduction#translation-files-location)
- **彈性的翻譯工作流程**：可使用 Git（monorepo、fork 或子模組）、SaaS 軟體、FTP
- **彈性的部署選項**：單一域名、多重域名或混合模式
- **模組化**：允許插件開發者提供 i18n 支援
- **低運行開銷**：文檔主要是靜態內容，無需繁重的 JS 庫或 polyfill
- **可擴展的構建時間**：允許獨立構建和部署本地化網站
- **本地化資源**：網站圖片可能包含需翻譯的文字
- **無耦合**：不強制使用任何 SaaS，但可整合
- **易於與 [Crowdin](https://crowdin.com/) 協作**：多個 Docusaurus 1 網站使用 Crowdin，應能遷移至 v2
- **良好的 SEO 預設值**：我們為您設置實用的 SEO 標頭如 [`hreflang`](https://developers.google.com/search/docs/advanced/crawling/localized-versions)
- **RTL 支援**：支援從右至左閱讀的語言（阿拉伯語、希伯來語等）且易於實現
- **預設翻譯**：經典主題標籤已為您翻譯成 [多種語言](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/tree/main/packages/docusaurus-theme-translations/locales)

segments.source_content: ## Showcase

translations.zh-hant: ## 案例展示

segments.source_content: We worked with a few volunteers to **dogfood the i18n support** before releasing it.

translations.zh-hant: 我們與幾位志願者合作，在發佈前 **實際驗證 i18n 支援**。

segments.source_content: ### Jest: upgrading Docusaurus

translations.zh-hant: ### Jest：升級 Docusaurus

segments.source_content: We have made it possible to **upgrade** a **translated Docusaurus 1 site** to Docusaurus 2.

translations.zh-hant: 我們已實現將**已翻譯的 Docusaurus 1 網站**升級至 Docusaurus 2 的功能。

segments.source_content: **[Jest](https://jestjs.io)**, using Docusaurus 1 and Crowdin was one of those sites.

translations.zh-hant: 使用 Docusaurus 1 和 Crowdin 的 **[Jest](https://jestjs.io)** 就是其中一個案例。

segments.source_content: The Docusaurus 2 migration was successful and the new site is now deployed in production ([announcement post](https://jestjs.io/blog/2021/03/09/jest-website-upgrade)).

translations.zh-hant: Docusaurus 2 遷移過程順利，新網站現已正式上線（參見[公告文章](https://jestjs.io/blog/2021/03/09/jest-website-upgrade)）。

segments.source_content: [![Jest's website front page in Japanese](/img/blog/2021-03-09-releasing-docusaurus-i18n/jest.png)](https://jestjs.io)

translations.zh-hant: [![日文版 Jest 網站首頁](/img/blog/2021-03-09-releasing-docusaurus-i18n/jest.png)](https://jestjs.io)

segments.source_content: ### Redwood: adopting Docusaurus

translations.zh-hant: ### Redwood：採用 Docusaurus

segments.source_content: [Redwood](https://redwoodjs.com/) is a React full-stack Jamstack framework.

translations.zh-hant: [Redwood](https://redwoodjs.com/) 是一個 React 全端 Jamstack 框架。

segments.source_content: They were looking for a solution to create an **internationalized learning platform**, and became early adopters of Docusaurus 2 i18n for [learn.redwoodjs.com](https://learn.redwoodjs.com/), using Crowdin to get it translated to French.

translations.zh-hant: 他們正在尋找建立**國際化學習平台**的解決方案，並成為 Docusaurus 2 i18n 的早期採用者，使用 Crowdin 將 [learn.redwoodjs.com](https://learn.redwoodjs.com/) 翻譯成法文。

segments.source_content: [![Redwood's doc page in French](/img/blog/2021-03-09-releasing-docusaurus-i18n/redwood.png)](https://learn.redwoodjs.com/)

translations.zh-hant: [![Redwood 法文版文件頁面](/img/blog/2021-03-09-releasing-docusaurus-i18n/redwood.png)](https://learn.redwoodjs.com/)

segments.source_content: ### Datagit: using LTR support

translations.zh-hant: ### Datagit：使用 RTL 支援

segments.source_content: The i18n system should work with any language, including **Right-to-Left languages**.

translations.zh-hant: i18n 系統應適用於任何語言，包括**從右至左書寫的語言**。

segments.source_content: [Datagit.ir](https://datagit.ir/) is using Farsi, and a simple configuration option is able to **flip the Docusaurus theme** to add the required Right-to-Left support.

translations.zh-hant: [Datagit.ir](https://datagit.ir/) 使用波斯語，只需簡單的配置選項即可**翻轉 Docusaurus 主題**以添加所需的從右至左支援。

segments.source_content: [![Datagit's website in Persian, a right-to-left language. The sidebar appears on the right of the window and the TOC appears on the left.](/img/blog/2021-03-09-releasing-docusaurus-i18n/datagit.png)](https://datagit.ir/)

translations.zh-hant: [![波斯文版 Datagit 網站（從右至左語言）。側邊欄位於視窗右側，目錄位於左側。](/img/blog/2021-03-09-releasing-docusaurus-i18n/datagit.png)](https://datagit.ir/)

segments.source_content: ## Conclusion

translations.zh-hant: ## 結論

segments.source_content: We sincerely hope you will adopt and like the new i18n support.

translations.zh-hant: 我們衷心希望您能採用並喜歡新的 i18n 支援功能。

segments.source_content: This feature has not been an easy one, and we would like to thank everyone that got involved in this journey:

translations.zh-hant: 此功能的實現並非易事，我們要感謝所有參與此過程的人員：

segments.source_content:
- [Alexey](https://github.com/lex111) for his help to make the i18n support exhaustive and even better than v1
- [Simen](https://github.com/SimenB) for volunteering and supporting the Jest migration
- [Claire](https://github.com/clairefro) for adopting Docusaurus 2 on the new Redwood platform and providing many feedbacks
- [Massoud](https://github.com/massoudmaboudi) for reviewing my work on LTR and adopting it on Datagit
- [Crowdin](https://crowdin.com/) for their support and willingness to improve their translation SaaS
- The Docusaurus community for their patience, and providing many useful feedbacks on GitHub

translations.zh-hant:
- [Alexey](https://github.com/lex111) 協助完善 i18n 支援並使其超越 v1 版本
- [Simen](https://github.com/SimenB) 自願支援 Jest 遷移工作
- [Claire](https://github.com/clairefro) 在 Redwood 新平台上採用 Docusaurus 2 並提供大量反饋
- [Massoud](https://github.com/massoudmaboudi) 審查 RTL 相關工作並在 Datagit 上實際應用
- [Crowdin](https://crowdin.com/) 提供支援並持續改進其翻譯 SaaS 服務
- Docusaurus 社群成員的耐心等待及在 GitHub 上提供的寶貴意見

segments.source_content: Thanks for reading.

translations.zh-hant: 感謝您的閱讀。

segments.source_content: 🙏 And please, add your brand new i18n sites to our [showcase page](https://docusaurus.io/showcase). We accept any all polished Docusaurus site here, and we are working on a [redesign](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/4238) allowing you to filter sites by features.

translations.zh-hant: 🙏 請將您新建的 i18n 網站提交至我們的[展示頁面](https://docusaurus.io/showcase)。我們接受所有精心製作的 Docusaurus 網站，目前正在進行[頁面改版](https://github.com/facebook/docusaurus/issues/4238)，未來將能按功能篩選網站。
